featured.text: Specifically, you will learn to prepare __(23)__ delicious items as roasted chicken, chili, turkey loaf, turkey loaf, meatballs, pasta, among others.

definition.zh_def: 一種由小麥粉和水製成的意大利食品，通常呈長條或形狀，煮熟後可與各種醬汁搭配食用。
definition.en_def: A type of Italian food made from wheat flour and water, typically shaped into long strands or various forms, and served with a variety of sauces after cooking.
definition.example: I love to eat pasta with marinara sauce.
